official_title: Entitled "National Day of Prayer and Thanksgiving".

summary.text: Calls for the President to declare a national time of repentance, sacrifice, prayer, and thanksgiving for the salvation and continued blessing of our nation and for peace in our hearts, in our communities, and in the world.
